result_list.explanation: Elle pleure amèrement. This stage direction describes an emotional delivery, indicating the manner in which the character is crying.
[Il interrompt la lecture. ] This stage direction describes a general action of interrupting the reading.
À mi-voix. This stage direction describes the delivery manner, indicating the character is speaking in a low voice.
S'échauffant. This stage direction describes the delivery manner, indicating the character is becoming more animated or heated.
Avec humeur. This stage direction describes the delivery manner, indicating the character is speaking with a bad mood or irritation.
Ronchaud prend un air sévère. This stage direction describes a general action of Ronchaud assuming a severe expression.
Il chante sur un air ridicule qu'il improvise. This stage direction describes music, as the character is singing a ridiculous tune that he improvises.
result_list.stgdir: Il chante sur un air ridicule qu'il improvise.

result_list.explanation: À demi-voix. This stage direction describes the delivery manner, indicating the character is speaking in a half-voice.
On entend des clameurs en dehors. This stage direction is a narration, describing the sound of clamors coming from outside.
result_list.stgdir: On entend des clameurs en dehors.

result_list.explanation: Criant au travers de la porte. This stage direction describes the delivery manner, indicating the character is shouting through the door.
